overview: Takin' Care of Mike is a remake of a LeSalon Video called "Cashload".  This sexy little comedy starts with Joey arriving at David's house looking for Mike. David is on his way out to spend his lover's money when Joey arrives. While David is out running wild in the mall, Joey has to figure out who all these cute young guys are who keep sneaking in and out of the house. He meets Mark and Tom, then Tad and Richie, but all are too busy to tell him where Mike is. Young Joey has to endure a crazy afternoon before he finally learns all about Taking Care of Mike!
title: Takin' Care of Mike
